knimeNode.name: HDF5 Files
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads HDF5 files from an archive.

fullDescription.intro:
This node reads HDF5 files from an archive. The path to the files will be contained in the output table.
Supported formats are:
.h5
fullDescription.option: Path or URL to the input archive.
Path to the output directory, where the files will be extracted to. The output directory may be a local URL, remote URLs usually don't work.

Specifies the content of the output table.
Location A string column with the path to the extracted files.
URI An URI column with the URIs to the extracted files.

Specifies the behavior if a file with the same name already exists.
Overwrite
Overwrites already existing files.
Abort
Will abort if a file or component already exists and open this file.
Keep both
Will keep both and rename the new one if a file or component already exists.
